title: New: Pure X – Someone Else
content:
One of the most heart-wrenching moments of the year thus far, Someone Else is the latest statement of intent from Austin’s Pure X.

Devastatingly honest and brutally cutting, it’s three and a half minutes of self-deprecation, loathing and unparalleled hatred. Documenting a time of great personal struggle, Someone Else is one of the highlights of their forthcoming LP Crawling Up The Stairs, out 14 May. Emotional doesn’t even come close.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
